sys_script_include.description: Auto populate title field in borrow table
sys_script_include.name: Auto populate title

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_361130819335c210ef267c5efaba102a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1383151_bkquest.Auto populate title</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Auto populate title field in borrow table</description><name>Auto populate title</name><script><![CDATA[var AutoPopulateTitle = Class.create();
AutoPopulateTitle.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    gettitle: function() {

        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1383151_bkquest_book_copy');
        if (gr.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_emp'))) {
            var userObj = {};
            userObj.Title = gr.title.getDisplayedValue();
        }
        return JSON.stringify(userObj);
    },
    type: 'AutoPopulateTitle'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harini.srija</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-24 11:14:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>361130819335c210ef267c5efaba102a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto populate title</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BookQuest" source="x_1383151_bkquest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="BookQuest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_361130819335c210ef267c5efaba102a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>harini.srija</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-07 06:25:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
